ftbultimine.change_shape: Coinnigh Shift + (Scrollaigh Luch nó eochracha Suas/Síos) chun cruth a athrú
ftbultimine.change_shape.no_shift: Scrollaigh eochracha Luiche nó Suas / Síos chun cruth a athrú
item.ftbultimine.ultiminer.tooltip: Cumasaíonn sé %s a úsáid agus é gníomhach
ftbultimine.client_settings.rendering.re: Uasmhéid Bloic le Rindreáil Imlíne le haghaidh
ftbultimine.client_settings.rendering.pr: Teimhneacht línte réamhamhairc ar bloic 'taobh istigh' iad
ftbultimine.client_settings.overlay.requ: An dteastaíonn uait sneak le haghaidh Roghchlár Cruth
Nuair a bhrúitear eochair Ultimine, an gcaithfidh an t-imreoir Sneak freisin chun an roghchlár cruthanna a thaispeáint?
ftbultimine.client_settings.overlay.shap: Agus an roghchlár roghnaithe cruth á thaispeáint tríd an eochair Ultimine a shealbhú agus a sneaking ag an am céanna, líon na n-ainmneacha cruthanna le taispeáint os cionn agus faoi bhun an chruth roghnaithe
ftbultimine.client_settings.overlay.over:
Tá Inset i dtreo lár an scáileáin.
Neamhaird má tá X pos sa lár.

Tá Inset i dtreo lár an scáileáin.
Neamhaird má tá Y pos sa lár.
ftbultimine.server_settings.features.rig: An bhfuil cead ag Ultimine barra a bhaint?
ftbultimine.server_settings.costs_limits: Bloic uasta in aghaidh na hoibríochta

An t-uaslíon bloic is féidir a bhriseadh nó a mhodhnú in aon oibríocht amháin
Má tá FTB Ranks suiteáilte, tabharfar tús áite don nód 'ftbultimine.max_blocks', más ann dó

This can be a fractional amount
If FTB Ranks is installed, the 'ftbultimine.exhaustion_per_block' node takes priority, if present
Players must have equipped either a damageable tool or an item in the 'ftbultimine:tools' item tag

This can be a fractional amount
If FTB Ranks is installed, the 'ftbultimine.experience_per_block' node takes priority, if present

Time in ticks required between successive uses of the Ultimine function
20 ticks = 1 second
If FTB Ranks is installed, the 'ftbultimine.ultimine_cooldown' node takes priority, if present
ftbultimine.server_settings.misc.merge_t: For shapeless digging mode, any blocks in these tags which share a block tag with the original mined block are valid candidates for Ultimining.

For shaped digging modes, any blocks in these tags which share a block tag with the original mined block are valid candidates for Ultimining.
Default of '*' means any block is a valid candidate.
ftbultimine.server_settings.misc.prevent: Ultimining will stop if the equipped tool has this much durability or less remaining. Setting this to 0 allows tools to break.
ftbultimine.server_settings.misc.cancel_: Advanced setting: stop digging if unbreakable blocks are encountered instead of skipping over those blocks
